properties.entry: SELECT /* com.kh.member.model.dao.MemberDao#loginMember */ USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , INTEREST , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?

INSERT /* com.kh.member.model.dao.MemberDao#insertMember */ INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , INTEREST ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE /* com.kh.member.model.dao.MemberDao#updateMember */ MEMBER SET USER_NAME = ? , PHONE = ? , EMAIL = ? , ADDRESS = ? , INTEREST = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.kh.member.model.dao.MemberDao#selectMember */ USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , INTEREST , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_ID = ?
UPDATE /* com.kh.member.model.dao.MemberDao#updatePwd */ MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
UPDATE /* com.kh.member.model.dao.MemberDao#deleteMember */ MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID =? AND USER_PWD = ?
